description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2021-Sep-14 11:48:45

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

BattChargeDuration.title: Battery Charge Duration
BattChargeDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration of time the battery was in the specified charge state for this battery charge event for Sumitomo trucks.

BattChargeState_Old.title: Battery Charge State
BattChargeState_Old.description: The current state of whether or not the battery is being charged for this battery charge event for Sumitomo trucks.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.
